data.name: Vodji Chat
data.detailed_description:
Vodji Chat is designed primarily for gamers that will change the mind about conversations in online games and sound quality,
but it finds good use in many different environments.

The app is designed for extensive communities of more than 500 simultaneous voice participants.
Competing applications that have spanned the Internet make our voice communication platform
stand out among all and also pay attention to the needs of our consumers.

Administrators are given the opportunity to own their users ' data in a convenient format.
Supports a plugin system for implementing complex tasks. We would like to provide our users with
functionality and improvements through our client and server APIs, as well as the ability to use
music bots. Administrators often use plugins to change the authentication algorithm to suit their needs or
provide their users with the necessary functionality.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
